title: Lunar Revel Art Contest - Sponsored by Wacom

replies.body:
Heya, 
I submitted my black and white Aurelion Sol art file but I was hoping to submit a web page (similar to my Star Guardian Nami web page) that has all my development work on it as well. In any case this is the URL https://feardakez.com/aurelionsol/

Thank you for your time.
-Kez
Thanks for sharing the link! I'll add it into the context of your entry. :)
Thank you kindly :3
another amazing set of concepts. You always do such a great job. It makes me so excited to see Aurelion get some love too!

Thank you my dude! Did you enter this time too?
{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Yep! Couldn't resist trying my hand at Warring Kingdoms Kindred!
AWESOME! any chance I can see!
I posted it here! http://seraphs-art.tumblr.com/image/171269215190
That's very cool. :) Thanks for sharing with us~
DUDE! That is so rad! Best of luck to you! Love them details!
thanks!
I'd like to see, too! :)
That's beautiful concept work. :)
Thank you :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Sounds good. i might give it a crack :)
oooh I might enter this one. Now you say toooo risque... That means an evelynn is out of the question{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Can you create and upload more than one?

Yes, but as with previous contests, quality will be appreciated more than quantity. If you have two great ideas and want to work on both great, but generally it's recommended to spend the extra time perfecting one submission rather than splitting it between two or more. You can also receive one prize.
Can I hand draw it then scan it to submit it?

Yes, so long as it meets the file and resolution requirements :)

>.jpg or .png, maximum file size is 5MB, suggested minimum dimensions are 2339x1654px and 200 dpi resolution.
Ah I just realised mine is over 5mb ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜© I didn't see that bit nooo ðŸ˜© that's hours Of work gone . There's no possible way for me to hand a smaller file size of it anymore is there?

Hello, I realise in hindsight I should have asked this earlier, I was wondering if the works I submitted could be submitted as a single entry? as besides the main image the others show development or other functions. The first four images are the submissions in question https://www.nickoei.com/. The first image being the finalised concept, second of scale comparison and art direction following, third is an orthographic for 3D models and fourth is some iteration development before being toned down to suit in game. Hovering the image should show the same file names as those submitted.
Nicholas_Oei_Lunar_Revel_01**,** Nicholas_Oei_Lunar_Revel_02**,** Nicholas_Oei_Lunar_Revel_03 **and** Nicholas_Oei_Lunar_Revel_04

Thank you and Cheers :D
gosh this looks absolutely incredible!!
Hey! I've got these grouped as a single entry for our panel process so you're all set, don't worry. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=7A8lcdYg,comment-id=00160001,timestamp=2018-02-28T03:35:56.100+0000)
>
> Hey! I've got these grouped as a single entry for our panel process so you're all set, don't worry. :)

Cheers! thank you very much
Those are awesome. :O Looks like official League art. <3

> [{quoted}](name=Krice,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=7A8lcdYg,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2018-02-27T08:35:30.783+0000)

That was the intention, glad it came through
Thank you :D
can I do a minecraft build?

Yep :) So long as the submission meets the entry requirements:

>formatted in .jpg or .png; the maximum file size is 5MB and suggested minimum dimensions are 2339x1654px and 200 dpi resolution.
The dimensions and dpi are only suggested minimums for quality and viewing purposes, they aren't an actual requirement. So long as the file is under 5MB you can have as high a dpi as you want.
You'd be welcome to post an imgur link or something here, but no guarantee the higher res entry would be the one used for judging.
Oh yes, I'd like to see it, too. :)

HELP ME !!!! 
 i cant upload it :/
Does the file you're trying to upload exceed 5MB? It won't accept it if that's the case.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=7A8lcdYg,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2018-02-25T13:31:03.351+0000)
>
> Does the file you're trying to upload exceed 5MB? It won't accept it if that's the case.

I thinks time is over ..  is there any way to submit it now .. i draw it like 78 hrs  :/

Unfortunately Seras is right, if you missed the deadline we unfortunately can't accept your entry out of fairness to other players.

That said, I'd love to see your art if you'd still like to share it? :)
As far as I know unfortunately no, once time is up, it's up.

Oh man. I ran out of time for (reasons) but I managed to upload what I had finished up to that point. I'm proud of the work.

Very interested to see the other entries too, when they're available. :)

i cant submit it now .. plz help someone ..  i tried it by 11.15 pm 
{{champion:53}}
Does the file you're trying to upload exceed 5MB? It won't accept it if that's the case.
I submitted my entry but it ended up around 10mb. Is this alright or should I resize my image so it fits below 5mb??
You'll have to resize it to fit the contest rules or it'll probably be marked ineligible.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=7A8lcdYg,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2018-02-24T12:56:40.403+0000)
>
> You'll have to resize it to fit the contest rules or it'll probably be marked ineligible.

Thatâ€™s odd because my image size is actually slightly lesss than the recommended size and at the correct resolution.

Edit: oh JK, I was reading the file size from the wrong location. Itâ€™s less than 5mb. ^^;

Not resize as in change the resolution, resize as in change the compression. If your dpi is too high and you have a few layers for example any png compression is going to be way too big (smallest png compression for mine was 60+) but a jpg will drop it considerably (largest jpg compression was 4.6).

What i had no idea this was even a thing {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}  it seems i cant enter this one, well i dont think i can draw a well made picture by tomorrow {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}  anyway i cant wait to see who wins {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} {{sticker:sg-jinx}} {{sticker:sg-lulu}}  if i did enter i think i would have done {{champion:222}}  and{{champion:254}} but im not too sure but i cant wait to enter the next contest.   {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Ima submit a stick figure, because thats as pro as i can get xD
Hey Defqor, you can enter multiple times - each entry will be judged on its own merits! It's up to you whether it is better for you to spend more time on one entry or across multiple entries.
